channel.title: Need french coder
channel.description:
Hi I'm presently needing of a coder who is completly speaking french! [u]Bonjour, je recherche présentement un codeur parlant le français emplement.[/u]
Help me faster please!!! [u]Aidez moi vite!!![/u]
[s]English only speaking[/s]
[u]Francophone seulement[/u]

item.title: Need french coder
item.dc:creator: @kiss_my_feet kiss my feet
item.description:
@kiss_my_feet wrote:

je suis francais et je code assez bien donc si tu as encore besoin de quelqu’un, inbox moi.

Read full topic

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

asshole_rule:

J’imagine que certaines personnes ne savent pas ce que Google Translator est

That is wrong on so many levels…

Tu parles pas le francais bien. (Might have got the gender confused, because I haven’t spoken or written any frenchin 4 years), but at least the tenses are correct.

item.title: Need french coder
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:15, topic:421129”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=523795.msg3811670#msg3811670 date=1320981874]

That awkward moment when all programming is done in english.

You can get other JDK language packs, surely?

Yes, but then the source code becomes speaking language-dependent.
[/quote]
Good encryption method. Create method and variable names in another language, using the English version of JDK.[/quote]

Except that the standard JDK does not accept any letter whose byte value is > 127, and even then, it’s limited to letters, numbers, and the underscore character.

Read full topic

They better just learn english, I’m dutch, learned french at school and learned english from forums lol
I don’t think my English is that bad.

It’s good apart from you only capitalized one noun in that sentence.
[/quote]
yo don’t go grammar nazi lmao,
it’s understandable I’m not going to bother about capitalizing[/quote]
What? Is the OP your account too?
